                    <svg class="popup-lng__icon-small" height="17px" width="20px">
                     <use xlink:href="#icon-chevron">
                     </use>
                    </svg>
                   </a>
                  </div>
                  <div class="popup-lng__item js-popup-lng-item" data-href="http://www.eukanuba.be/fr-be" data-popup-lng="fr-be">
                   <a class="popup-lng__flag" href="http://www.eukanuba.be/fr-be">
                    <svg class="popup-lng__flag-icon">
                     <use xlink:href="#icon-flag-fr-be">
                     </use>
                    </svg>
                   </a>
                   <a class="popup-lng__text" href="http://www.eukanuba.be/fr-be">
                    <span>
                     Je préfère en français
                    </span>
                    <svg class="popup-lng__icon-small" height="17px" width="20px">
                     <use xlink:href="#icon-chevron">
                     </use>
                    </svg>
                   </a>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                </div>
               </li>
               <li class="language-selector__item">
                <a class="language-selector__link" data-gtm-action="Click" data-gtm-category="Country Selector" data-gtm-click="" data-gtm-label=" Country &gt; http://www.eukanuba.bg/" href="http://www.eukanuba.bg/">

           <nav class="top-nav">
            <ul class="top-nav__list">
             <li class="top-nav__item">
              <a class="top-nav__link link" href="https://www.eukanuba.de/why-eukanuba" target="">
               Warum EUKANUBA?
              </a>
             </li>
             <li class="top-nav__item">
              <a class="top-nav__link link" data-gtm-action="Click" data-gtm-category="Find a Store" data-gtm-click="" data-gtm-label="Click to Find a Store" href="https://www.eukanuba.de/shop" target="">
               Händler finden
              </a>
             </li>
             <li class="top-nav__item">
              <a class="top-nav__link link" href="https://www.eukanuba.de/zuechter-club" target="_blank">
               Züchterclub
              </a>
             </li>
             <li class="top-nav__item">
              <a class="top-nav__link link" data-gtm-action="Click" data-gtm-category="Email" data-gtm-click="" data-gtm-label="Email" href="mailto:info@eukanuba-service.eu?subject=Message from EUKANUBA website (Germany)" target="">
               Schicken Sie uns eine E-Mail
              </a>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </nav>
           <div class="main-nav__lng-selector">
            <div class="language-selector dropdown" data-component="language-selector" data-dropdown-name="language-selector" data-time="0.3">
             <div class="language-selector__head" data-ref="dropdown-trigger">
              <img alt="de" class="language-selector__h-flag" height="14" src="/assets/app/general/img/flags/de.svg" width="14"/>
              <span class="language-selector__h-lbl">
               DE
              </span>
              <svg class="language-selector__dropdown-icon icon" height="3" width="6">
               <use xlink:href="#icon-chevron-down" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">
               </use>
              </svg>
             </div>
             <div class="language-selector__dropdown dropdown__content" data-ref="dropdown-content">
              <div class="dropdown__inner language-selector__inner">
               <ul class="language-selector__list">
                <li class="language-selector__item">
                 <a class="language-selector__link" data-component="popup-lng-caller" data-gtm-action="Click" data-gtm-category="Country Selector" data-gtm-click="" data-gtm-label=" Country &gt;" href="#">
                  <img alt="be" class="language-selector__flag lazyload" data-src="/assets/app/general/img/flags/be.svg" height="20" width="20"/>
                  <span class="language-selector__lbl">
                   Belgium
                  </span>
                 </a>
                 <div class="popup-lng__container js-popup-lng">
                  <div class="popup-lng__bg">
                   <img alt="" class="lazyload" data-src="https://www.eukanuba.co.uk/-/media/images/popup/popup-belgium.ashx?mw=767&amp;hash=75386EF1B78807A693D36030F6F95B024014A471" data-srcset="https://www.eukanuba.co.uk/-/media/images/popup/popup-belgium.ashx?mw=375&amp;hash=0CB2CA5AD06DE842E961BF27DBE0F6503E1E2784 375w,

                   <svg class="popup-lng__icon-bg" height="100%">
                    <use xlink:href="#icon-chevron">
                    </use>
                   </svg>
                  </div>
                  <div class="popup-lng__close">
                  </div>
                  <h2 class="popup-lng__caption">
                   <span>
                    BIENVENUE SUR EUKANUBA BELGIQUE / WElKOM BIJ EUKANUBA BELGIÉ
                   </span>
                  </h2>
                  <div class="popup-lng__middle">
                   <div class="popup-lng__item js-popup-lng-item" data-href="http://www.eukanuba.be/nl-be" data-popup-lng="nl-be">
                    <a class="popup-lng__flag" href="http://www.eukanuba.be/nl-be">
                     <svg class="popup-lng__flag-icon">
                      <use xlink:href="#icon-flag-nl-be">
                      </use>
                     </svg>
                    </a>
                    <a class="popup-lng__text" href="http://www.eukanuba.be/nl-be">
                     <span>
                      Ik geef de voorkeur aan Nederlands
                     </span>
                     <svg class="popup-lng__icon-small" height="17px" width="20px">

                      </use>
                     </svg>
                    </a>
                   </div>

                  <img alt="Slovensko" class="language-selector__flag lazyload" data-src="/assets/app/general/img/flags/sk.svg" height="20" width="20"/>
                  <span class="language-selector__lbl">
                   Slovensko
                  </span>
                 </a>
                </li>
                <li class="language-selector__item">

                  </span>
                 </a>

                  </span>

              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </div>
          </div>

                  </div>
                  <div class="mega-nav__links-col">
                   <a class="mega-nav__sublink" href="https://www.eukanuba.de/pet-care-and-advice?articleCategory=nutrition&amp;lifestage=dogs-senior&amp;articleSpecies=dog">
                    Ernährung
                   </a>
                  </div>
                  <div class="mega-nav__links-col">
                   <a class="mega-nav__sublink" href="https://www.eukanuba.de/pet-care-and-advice?articleCategory=training&amp;lifestage=dogs-senior&amp;articleSpecies=dog">
                    Training
                   </a>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                </div>
               </div>
              </div>
             </li>
             <li class="mega-nav__item mega-nav__item--separated dropdown dropdown--bordered" data-component="dropdown" data-desktop="false" data-dropdown-name="mobile-navigation" data-ref="nav-item" data-time="0.3">
              <a class="mega-nav__link dropdown__header" data-ref="dropdown-trigger" href="https://www.eukanuba.de/products/for-cats?lifestage=cats-adult,cats-senior,kitten">
               <div class="mega-nav__title">
                Katzen
               </div>
               <div class="mega-nav__caption">
               </div>
              </a>
              <div class="mega-nav__submenu dropdown__content" data-ref="submenu dropdown-content">
               <div class="mega-nav__submenu-inner">
                <div class="mega-nav__col">
                 <a class="mega-nav__subtitle" href="https://www.eukanuba.de/products/for-cats?lifestage=cats-adult,cats-senior,kitten">
                  Alle Produkte
                 </a>
                 <div class="mega-nav__links-container ">
                  <div class="mega-nav__links-col">
                   <a class="mega-nav__sublink" href="https://www.eukanuba.de/products/for-cats?lifestage=kitten">
                    Kätzchen
                   </a>
                  </div>
                  <div class="mega-nav__links-col">
                   <a class="mega-nav__sublink" href="https://www.eukanuba.de/products/for-cats?lifestage=cats-adult">
                    Ausgewachsen
                   </a>
                  </div>
                  <div class="mega-nav__links-col">
                   <a class="mega-nav__sublink" href="https://www.eukanuba.de/products/for-cats?lifestage=cats-senior">
                    Senior
                   </a>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                </div>
                <div class="mega-nav__col">
                 <a class="mega-nav__subtitle" href="https://www.eukanuba.de/pet-care-and-advice?lifestage=cats-adult,cats-senior,kitten&amp;articleSpecies=cat">
                  Beratung &amp; Pflege
                 </a>
                 <div class="mega-nav__links-container">
                  <div class="mega-nav__links-col">

                    Verhalten
                   </a>
                  </div>
                  <div class="mega-nav__links-col">
                   <a class="mega-nav__sublink" href="https://www.eukanuba.de/pet-care-and-advice?articleCategory=care&amp;lifestage=cats-adult,cats-senior,kitten&amp;articleSpecies=cat">
                    Pflege
                   </a>
                  </div>
                  <div class="mega-nav__links-col">

                    Gesundheit
                   </a>
                  </div>
                  <div class="mega-nav__links-col">
                   <a class="mega-nav__sublink" href="https://www.eukanuba.de/pet-care-and-advice?articleCategory=nutrition&amp;lifestage=cats-adult,cats-senior,kitten&amp;articleSpecies=cat">
                    Ernährung
                   </a>
                  </div>

          </div>

        </div>
       </div>
       <div class="slider" data-component="slider" data-type="hero">
        <div class="slider__wrapper">
         <!-- carousel item start -->
         <div class="slider__slide" data-ref="slide">
          <div class="header__slide">
           <img alt="https://www.eukanuba.de/dylans-story" class="header__hero-image js-object-fit-image" src="https://www.eukanuba.co.uk/-/media/images/eukanuba/global/hero-header/dylan2.ashx?mw=2000&amp;hash=908722016555EC8B6DD1E61CC3FE06DD6032C2DC 2000w" srcset="https://www.eukanuba.co.uk/-/media/images/eukanuba/global/hero-header/dylan2.ashx?mw=400&amp;hash=131618D9F8D3E5D16B75D5A7C6DB877CE5FCE4D8 400w, https://www.eukanuba.co.uk/-/media/images/eukanuba/global/hero-header/dylan2.ashx?mw=800&amp;hash=29AC760670D14C2A095D8CE2FFC226B3F5D99F66 800w, https://www.eukanuba.co.uk/-/media/images/eukanuba/global/hero-header/dylan2.ashx?mw=1200&amp;hash=EFCF990F5231EB7DEEA81835C8677F98CB789809 1200w, https://www.eukanuba.co.uk/-/media/images/eukanuba/global/hero-header/dylan2.ashx?mw=1600&amp;hash=6DC7641A8B56434517F5D49B18781C4E85064625 1600w, https://www.eukanuba.co.uk/-/media/images/eukanuba/global/hero-header/dylan2.ashx?mw=2000&amp;hash=908722016555EC8B6DD1E61CC3FE06DD6032C2DC 2000w"/>
           <script type="application/ld+json">
            {
                                   "@context": "http://schema.org",
                                   "@type": "ImageObject",

                                 }
           </script>
           <div class="header__slide-wrap container">
            <div class="header__content">
             <h1 class="header__title title-l">
              <span class="title-labeled">
               Dylans
              </span>
              GESCHICHTE
             </h1>
             <div class="header__summary">
              Der sieben Jahre alte Dylan liebt es, durch Felder seinem Lieblings-Tennisball hinterher zu laufen. Erfahren Sie, wie EUKANUBA ihm hilft gut zu leben.
             </div>
             <a class="header__cta button button--arrowed" href="https://www.eukanuba.de/dylans-story">
              Lesen Sie DYLANS Geschichte
              <svg class="icon" height="18" width="11">
               <use xlink:href="#icon-chevron" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">
               </use>
              </svg>
             </a>
            </div>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
         <!-- carousel item end -->
        </div>
        <div class="header__slides-pagination slider-pagination">
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </header>
     <div class="promo-bar">
      <div class="container">
       <div class="promo-bar__container">
        <div class="promo-bar__data-wrapper">
         <div class="promo-bar__percentage">
         </div>
         <div class="promo-bar__text">
          Hunde konnten 30 % länger leben als die für ihre Rasse typische Lebenserwartung mit EUKANUBA und artgerechter Pflege
         </div>
        </div>
        <div class="promo-bar__link-wrapper">
         <a class="promo-bar__link" href="https://www.eukanuba.de/proof-of-a-long-life">
          Lesen Sie mehr über unsere  10jährige Beobachtung
          <svg class="promo-bar__link-icon icon" height="25" width="16">
           <use xlink:href="#icon-chevron">
           </use>
          </svg>
         </a>
        </div>
       </div>

       </h2>

       <a class="card-collection__btn button button--arrowed button--wide button--mobile-full-width" data-gtm-action="Click" data-gtm-category="Submit pet story" data-gtm-click="" data-gtm-label="Submit pet story &gt; Home" href="/pet-care?articleCategory=breeders">
        Lesen Sie die Erfahrungsberichte unserer Züchter
        <svg class="icon" height="18" width="11">
         <use xlink:href="#icon-chevron">
         </use>
        </svg>
       </a>
      </div>
     </div>
